official_title: A bill to validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.

summary.text: Validates specified conveyances in California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to a named railroad.

titles.title: A bill to validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.
